tests.name: scan_accuracy_metrics
tests.description: Scan for accuracy issues. This scans the base dataset (more specifically the validation samples of the dataset) for issues where the value of the specified accuracy metrics are below and/or above the specified thresholds.

tests.name: scan_target_leakage_comparison
tests.description: Scan for leakage in training (base) dataset not present in comparison dataset on all applicable features.
